The Epsilon Kappa Chapter presents

The 32 Elements of Supremacy

GREETINGS

In honor of our 8th anniversary as members of Delta Sigma Theta, it is with great pleasure that I introduce you to the official memory page for the 32 Elements of Supremacy.

Linesisters

ABOUT US

On December 7, 2008, the Epsilon Kappa Chapter of Delta Sigma Theta, presented The 32 Elements of Supremacy to the yard at the University of Memphis. This group of extraordinary women, continued the dynamic and devastating legacy of EK.
